downward: we are seeing hope in reopening the country and everything will be fine for sure.
it is hopeful that COVID-19 will have less impact on our lives and we can expect everything to recover.
there is more hope that we can overcome the COVID-19 pandemic so let's keep fighting against it and see what happens next.
upward: as it is still increasing, please take proper precautions, and do not lose hope anyway.
please take protective measures when appropriate, and keep an eye on the latest news.
since the numbers are still rising, it may still take some time before we can return to normal social lives.
please follow the guidelines and practice social distance, and do everything you can to protect yourself.
keep an eye out for updates on COVID-19, and stay both physically and mentally healthy.
